description: The table stores the measurement information (MEA segment information) entered in a charge session. Each row in the table is one line of measurement for one procedure, including MEA reference ID code, MEA qualifier, MEA value, and MEA date. Note: temporary accounts receivable (TAR) records in Chronicles are purged periodically depending on your system setting. Be aware that old data in this table might be lost if you truncate the table.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the�temporary transaction�record on which the charge review activity is performed.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.  This represents a single charge procedure on the temporary transaction record.

columns.name: MEA_LINE
columns.description: The line count for the measurement information entered for a procedure.

columns.name: MEA_REF_ID_C
columns.description: The measurement reference ID code for a procedure.

columns.name: MEA_QUALIFIER_C
columns.description: The measurement qualifier for a procedure.

columns.name: MEA_VALUE
columns.description: The measurement value for a procedure.

columns.name: MEA_DATE
columns.description: The date the measurement was collected for a procedure.
